gunicorn.http.errors
====================

.. py:module:: gunicorn.http.errors


Exceptions
----------

   gunicorn.http.errors.ParseException
   gunicorn.http.errors.NoMoreData

   gunicorn.http.errors.ForbiddenProxyRequest
   gunicorn.http.errors.InvalidSchemeHeaders


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:exception:: ParseException

   Bases: :py:obj:`Exception`


   Common base class for all non-exit exceptions.


.. py:exception:: NoMoreData(buf=None)

   Bases: :py:obj:`OSError`


   Base class for I/O related errors.


   .. py:attribute:: buf
      :value: None



.. py:exception:: InvalidRequestLine(req)

   Bases: :py:obj:`ParseException`


   Common base class for all non-exit exceptions.


   .. py:attribute:: req


   .. py:attribute:: code
      :value: 400

   .. py:attribute:: method

   .. py:attribute:: version

   Common base class for all non-exit exceptions.


   .. py:attribute:: hdr

      :value: None

   Bases: :py:obj:`ParseException`


   Common base class for all non-exit exceptions.


   .. py:attribute:: host

      :value: 403

   Common base class for all non-exit exceptions.
